TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ImmutableArray extends System.Object
public ref class ImmutableArray abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于创建不可变数组的方法；这意味着，该数组在创建后不可更改。

span.span: Provides methods for creating an array that is immutable; meaning it cannot be changed once it is created.

summary.span: **NuGet package**: System.Collections.Immutable（关于不可变集合和安装方法）

span.span: **NuGet package**: System.Collections.Immutable (about immutable collections and how to install)
This type is thread safe.

typeparam.span: 数组中存储的元素的类型。

param.span: 要搜索的对象。

summary.span: 使用默认比较器在已排序的数组中搜索指定的元素，如果已找到，则返回该元素的从零开始的索引。

span.span: Searches the sorted immutable array for a specified element using the default comparer and returns the zero-based index of the element, if it's found.

returns.span: 如果找到该项，则为数组中项的从零开始的索引；否则为一个负数，该负数是大于 的下一个元素的索引的按位求补。如果没有更大的元素，则为 的按位求补。

span.span: The zero-based index of the item in the array, if item is found; otherwise, a negative number that is the bitwise complement of the index of the next element that is larger than or, if there is no larger element, the bitwise complement of .

exception.span: 不实现 或搜索遇到不实现 的元素。

span.span: does not implement or the search encounters an element that does not implement .

param.span: 对象的源数组。

span.span: The source array of objects.

param.name: start
param.span: 要从 复制的第一个元素的索引。

span.span: The index of the first element to copy from .

param.name: length
param.span: 中要包括在此不可变数组内的元素数。

span.span: The number of elements from to include in this immutable array.

summary.span: 从另一个不可变数组创建包含指定对象的不可变数组。

span.span: Creates an immutable array with the specified objects from another immutable array.

returns.span: 一个不可变数组，其中包含源数组中的指定对象。

span.span: An immutable array that contains the specified objects from the source array.

remarks.format: 当新数组是现有数组的段时，此重载允许 helper 方法或自定义生成器类有效地避免支付用于复制数组的冗余税款。This overload allows helper methods or custom builder classes to efficiently avoid paying a redundant tax for copying an array when the new array is a segment of an existing array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载允许基于现有 有效地创建 ，其中需要将映射函数应用于源数组中的每个元素。This overload allows efficient creation of an based on an existing , where a mapping function needs to be applied to each element from the source array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载允许基于现有 的切片高效地创建 ，其中，需要将映射函数应用于生成的数组中包含的源数组中的每个元素。This overload allows efficient creation of an based on a slice of an existing , where a mapping function needs to be applied to each element from the source array included in the resulting array.
